explanation.overview: 这些形容词都描述有价值或特别的事物，但在具体含义和用法上有所不同。

details.meaning: 指因稀缺、情感价值或实际价值而珍贵，强调值得珍惜和保护
details.example: She keeps her precious jewelry in a safe.（她把珍贵的珠宝保存在保险箱里。）

details.meaning: 指被深爱或珍视的，强调情感纽带
details.example: This teddy bear was my loved childhood companion.（这个泰迪熊是我珍爱的童年伙伴。）

details.meaning: 字面意思是'无价的'，强调价值高到无法估量
details.example: The museum houses many priceless artworks.（博物馆收藏了许多无价的艺术品。）

details.meaning: 指稀有、不常见的，强调稀缺性
details.example: This stamp is rare and highly sought after.（这枚邮票很稀有，备受追捧。）

life_examples.precious: These photos are precious to our family.（这些照片对我们家很珍贵。）
life_examples.loved: My loved grandmother passed away last year.（我敬爱的祖母去年去世了。）
life_examples.priceless: The look on her face was priceless.（她脸上的表情是无价的。）
life_examples.rare: It's rare to see such a large family these days.（如今很少见到这么大的家庭了。）

life_examples.precious: He collects precious stones.（他收集宝石。）
life_examples.loved: The loved painting was donated to the museum.（这幅珍爱的画作被捐赠给了博物馆。）
life_examples.priceless: The auction featured several priceless antiques.（拍卖会展示了几件无价的古董。）
life_examples.rare: This rare book was printed in the 15th century.（这本稀有书籍印刷于15世纪。）

common_errors.error: ❌ This loved diamond is very expensive.
common_errors.correction: ✅ This precious/priceless diamond is very expensive.（钻石价值应用precious/priceless）
✅ Time with family is precious.（家庭时光的珍贵应用precious）

mini_test.question: 选择最合适的词：The ___ manuscript was kept in a climate-controlled room.
哪个词最适合描述'无法用金钱衡量的经历'？
填空：Her ___ childhood toy was falling apart but she couldn't bear to throw it away.
